content.description: A zoo sponsored a one-day contest to name a new baby elephant. Zoo visitors deposited entries in a special box between noon (t=0) and 8 P.M. (t=8) . The number of entries in the box t hours after noon is modeled by a differentiable function E for 0 ≤ t ≤ 8  Values of E(t) , in hundreds of entries, at various times t are shown in the table above.
content.question: According to the model from part (c), at what time were the entries being processed most quickly? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: According to the model from part (c), at what time were the entries being processed most quickly? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 4.3: Rates of Change in Applied Contexts Other Than Motion

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
